data.oai_dc:dc: Spatial data layers describing: (1) mean annual vessel intensity, occupancy and pressure for (A) bulk carrier and cargo vessels, (B) offshore service vessels, (C) passenger vessels, and (D) tankers in the Republic of Congo (Congo-Brazzaville) derived from Automatic Identification System (AIS) data from 2012 - 2014 obtained under commercial licence from © 2018 exactEarth Ltd, and (2) distribution of (A) broad-scale seabed habitats, (B) marine boundaries, (C) marine ecosystems and (D) legally defined zones within the Republic of Congo's waters. This file also includes all figures presented in the paper and supporting information.

Automatic identification system (AIS)|Ecosystem-based Management|Marine Spatial Planning|Merchant Shipping|Satellite Automatic identification system (S-AIS)|Vessel movement|AIS data visualisation|Threat mapping
